description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In a world overrun by mongooses, one snake must battle through nine dangerous pixilated levels to survive. This 1-bit game was originally developed for the TI-83 and developed for XNA in under 60 minutes.
